DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Age : 18 45 year Sex : male Men proven spontaneous fertility ( pregnancy start less two year inclusion ) 2 5 day sexual abstinence All subject give inform consent participate study The subject must affiliate social security scheme . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Personal history infertility Personal history chemotherapy History recurrent miscarriage couple Andrological history since last pregnancy : urogenital infection , testicular trauma , testicular torsion , varicocele , abdominopelvic surgery Fever within 3 month inclusion .
